Room.Name: East Gate
Room.ShortDescription: This is the East Gate entrance to the town of Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: Caledonia Road to the west will take you to the center of the village. Taragon Road follows along the eastern village wall to the north and south. The great gate is almost always open, and leads out of the village. The only time it closes is after sundown, except in times of emergency. There is a city militia barracks a short distance to the north.
